user_prompt: Alex Smith mentioned syncing with Jordan Johnson, Sam Williams about the project next week. Please find a few possible time slots for that meeting.

expected_tool_sequence.reason: Get email address for Alex Smith
Get email address for Jordan Johnson
Get email address for Sam Williams
Find common free time slots for all participants

answer_requirements: The meeting duration should be 45 minutes.
The meeting time must be within working hours (09:00-18:00).
The meeting should be scheduled for next week.
The meeting must include all specified participants: Alex Smith, Jordan Johnson, Sam Williams.
